title: How to Make a No Bake Pumpkin Pie

steps.headline: Mix the gelatine and spices together in a heavy saucepan.
Add the beaten eggs and condensed milk and combine thoroughly.
Place the saucepan on a low heat.
steps.description: Stir constantly for at least 10 minutes until the mixture thickens or the gelatine dissolves. Remove the saucepan from the heat.

steps.headline: Add the pumpkin puree to the mixture.
Pour the pumpkin mixture in the crust.
steps.description: Place in the refrigerator for at least 3 hours for the mixture to settle and set.

steps.headline: Serve with whipped cream on top for a delicious garnish.

text: Mix the gelatine and spices together in a heavy saucepan.  Add the beaten eggs and condensed milk and combine thoroughly.  Place the saucepan on a low heat. Stir constantly for at least 10 minutes until the mixture thickens or the gelatine dissolves. Remove the saucepan from the heat. Add the pumpkin puree to the mixture. Mix thoroughly until well combined. Pour the pumpkin mixture in the crust. Place in the refrigerator for at least 3 hours for the mixture to settle and set. Serve with whipped cream on top for a delicious garnish.
